reviews.review: I like the quality/graphics. I am happy that it is now cross platform. What I don't really like is, that it is unfair with starting players being matched with lower ranks if they game with a friend that is of lower ranks.

Ótimo jogo, tirando todos os bugs e matchmaking zuado. Enjoativo, sem mt variedade, poderia ter muito mais mecânica, perks muito abusivos para killer e só perk bosta pra sobrevivente, se vc quer passar raiva compra essa merda ai.

This game has a really different take on cooperative gaming. The overall feel and smoothness of controls, as well as the overall graphics make this game completely worth the buy. The creators constantly update with new and exciting maps and killers. Updates are relatively small, but pack a big punch. The only "negative" which it really isn't a negative is that when playing with randoms, you are unable to chat.

Motivos do pq esse jogo ser "complicado":

-comunidade burra
-jogadores burros e tóxicos 
-to viciado 
-mãe me ajuda
-alguns perks muito inuteis enquanto outros muito op's

Juego de lo mas entretenido, obviamente se disfruta mejor con amigos pero de igual forma jugar en solitario se logra disfrutar ya que puedes irte como asesino ofreciendote un modo de juego diferente al sobreviviente, tiene variedad de personajes y algunos muy iconicos del terror, les recomiendo jugarlo y no desaprovechar cuando esta en oferta.
:D
ESSE JOGO EH BAO MAIS N TENHO AMIGOS
Muito bom, fico rindo sem parar com os killers

待望のクロスプレイ実装！やったね！
と思いたいところだが、
CS勢がキラーを全くやりたがらない為
PC勢がCS勢のケツを拭いてやってるゲーム
一応擁護すると
フレームレート、コントローラーの問題でPC鯖にボコボコにされるの分かっててキラーをやる人はいないでしょう
(言うてもCS勢にキラーいなかったらしいので擁護する必要もないが)

クロスプレイをONにするとサバイバーは凄い待たされるよ
でも、キラーは１分かからずマッチングするんだ
『キラーをやりたい』！って言う末期の方にとってはいいゲームではないでしょうか(適当)
バグ、民度面でも終わっており、こんな状況下でもキラーをやる人は神様ですね

とりあえず鯖やる時はクロスプレイをOFFにして、キラーをやるときはクロスプレイをONにしましょう。
игра говно, помойка безнадежная, что-то на войну гонят

In a game full of murderous psychopaths ruled by an ancient, incomprehensible horror and where death is just a precursor to endless suffering, the biggest nightmare is updating the game.

Seriously, it's faster to uninstall and then re-install it. Why are some games awful like this?
I like everything so far but just annoying with some bugs.
Don't care, game sucks.
F

Played this game for years, when it first came out it was great.
Now its full of toxic and hateful people, the game mechanics are broken as anything. "We did a good job" No. really no, You game devs break the game more then fix it. Dead Hard doesn't work half the time. The Killers are hitting people from China.

Is this game worth buying? Not really unless you like dealing with every toxic ass on this game.
End of game chat needs to be disabled, There is ZERO, ZERO point to having the end of game chat, Just there for people to bitch at each other and get mad.

Desventaja: Demasiados DLC, ya que con mas personajes tengas, mas perks tienes y mas formas de jugar hay y asi se hace mucho mas divertido.

Gra bardzo przyjemna, dzięki ciągłym dodatkom i dobrej mechanice rozgrywki można spędzić grając w nią bardzo dużo czasu. Jedynym dużym minusem jest matchmaking który ewidentnie jest źle wykonany i daje dosyć często razem 1 i 20 rangowców. Gra jest warta zakupu jeśli lubisz podobne rodzaje gier.  Ocena 9/10.
The scariest part of the game is the other survivors you get matched with.
